item.title: How to reshape data in wide or long format in R
item.description: Reshaping though frequently required in data analysis, so often it remains confusing even if you are frequent user of reshape function in R.Here I have provided more explanation with simulated data. Reshape data from wide to long Wide data: the observation has been made several time but all the observations for given person is recorded in single row in spreadsheet.For example, in clinic, person visiting every month for their blood pressure check, and nurse note down the value for each month in single row which belong to this specific person.
